alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:44AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nance, northern Merrick and western Polk Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 344 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Belgrade to Palmer. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Belgrade around 350 AM CDT. Fullerton around 355 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Genoa, Clarks and Silver Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for south central, central and east central Nebraska.
